name: Dragonfire Port
description:
Dragonfire

You are a mere peasant, but the dragon's castle holds many riches! Avoid the deadly fire and enter the inner chamber to collect as much as you can.

Controls

Outdoors:

Arrow Keys: Left/Right Movement
Down Arrow: Duck
X Button: Jump

Indoors:

Arrow Keys: 4-Way Movement

Restart:
X Button: Reset after you lose all six lives

Game

This is a port of the 1982 Atari 2600 game Dragonfire. This version is adapted to Pico-8 and Lua. This modification was made during a one week period in Pico-8.
